settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.

settings.question: Phentermine
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: WEIGHT MANAGEMENT

Phentermine is a stimulant used as an appetite suppressant, which affects the central nervous system. Phentermine can be used clinically as part of a weight loss program and diet and exercise to treat obesity in people with risk factors such as diabetes, high cholesterol, and hypertension.

settings.question: Sildenafil (Viagra)
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: SEXUAL WELLNESS

Sildenafil is a phosphodiesterase (PDE) inhibitor used to treat male sexual function problems, particularly impotence or erectile dysfunction, or ED. It does so by increasing blood flow to the penis during sexual stimulation to bring about and maintain an erection.

settings.question: Tadalafil
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: SEXUAL WELLNESS

Tadalafil treats erectile dysfunction (impotence) and benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) symptoms, such as difficulty with urination in adult men. Tadalafil is a phosphodiesterase (PDE) inhibitor. It treats erectile dysfunction by increasing blood flow to the penis during sexual stimulation for the patient to achieve and maintain an erection.

settings.question: Finasteride
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: HAIR GROWTH

Finasteride, sold under the brand name Propecia, treats hair loss in men. It belongs to a class of drugs known as 5-alpha-reductase inhibitors. It works by preventing testosterone from breaking down into DHT, the hormone thought to cause male pattern baldness.

settings.question: Minoxidil
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: HAIR GROWTH

Minoxidil is a vasodilator that promotes hair growth by increasing blood flow in the scalp, relaxing the muscle walls of the blood vessels, and improving the tissue’s overall health through the easier flow of blood to your scalp and hair follicles. This vasodilating effect brings more nutrients and oxygen to your hair follicles, promoting growth and strengthening existing follicles.

settings.question: HCG (Pregnyl)
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: WEIGHT MANAGEMENT

HCG stands for Human Chorionic Gonadotropin, a natural pregnancy hormone with a protein base that helps maintain important hormones like progesterone and estrogen, which are essential during pregnancy, particularly the first 3 months. More recently, HCG has been used for fat loss due to its effect on boosting metabolism and weight loss mechanisms.

Combined with a low-calorie diet, HCG treatments allow users to experience rapid weight loss, averaging 1-2lbs a day of unwanted fat. The HCG injection increases metabolism for faster fat burning.

settings.question: Omnitrope (Somatropin)
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: HEALING, MUSCLE GROWTH, WEIGHT MANAGEMENT, OPTIMAL HEALTH

Omnitrope is a synthetic human growth hormone (HGH) often used by athletes to achieve accelerated recovery from injuries, increase muscle mass, increase physical strength, and activate the breakdown of body fat. It can also help patients with growth hormone deficiency (GHD).

settings.question: Dutasteride
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: PROSTATE HEALTH

Dutasteride – brand name Avodart – is a prescription drug used for treating an enlarged prostate or benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). When the prostate is enlarged, it can squeeze the urethra (the tube that transports urine out of the body) and lead to problems with urination. Dutasteride helps to improve the flow of urine and reduces urinary frequency. 

It is also known to block DHT (dihydrotestosterone). DHT often contributes to hair loss in men. The use of Dutasteride may improve male pattern baldness, increasing hair growth. 

Benefits:

• Improves urinary flow

• Treats urinary urgency/frequency

• Blocks DHT

• Improve male pattern baldness

settings.question: Ultra Burn (Methionine/Inositol/Choline) + B1 (Thiamine) + B12
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: WEIGHT MANAGEMENT, INCREASED ENERGY

UltraBurn is a custom compound of fat metabolizers, acids, and B vitamins that promotes weight loss and prevents excess fluid build-up through the speedier fat breakdown in the liver.

It is made of Methionine, Choline, Inositol, Thiamine(B1), and Vitamin B-12. Methionine is an amino acid and antioxidant that accelerates fat breakdown, detoxifies the liver, and prevents fatigue. Choline, a B-vitamin, supports fat loss while promoting liver and cardiovascular health. Inositol, another B-vitamin, reduces bad cholesterol to aid in body fat redistribution and promote healthy sleep. Thiamine assists in carb breakdown for energy, leading to weight loss through increased metabolism. Vitamin B-12 maintains metabolic pathways for the proper processing of fats, proteins, and calorie burning.

Benefits:

• Enhances your body’s natural fat-burning capabilities

• Reduces the amount of stored fat

• Improves and accelerates your metabolism

• Improves your energy levels and mood

• Increases motivation

• Helps control cholesterol levels

• Resets fat metabolism and fat removal from your liver

• Provides essential components of normal cell and brain function
